event.title: Burnout and Mental Health in Open Source
event.metaTitle: Burnout and Mental Health in Open Source
event.metaDesc: Burnout is a relatable issue, almost everyone has been there – and it’s something we see quite often in open source. CHAOSS is hosting an interactive working group session to understand how maintainers manage burnout and talk about how to facilitate conversations about burnout and mental health in their open source communities. We will also discuss the Project Burnout metric from our DEI working group.
event.content: Burnout is a relatable issue, almost everyone has been there – and it’s something we see quite often in open source. CHAOSS is hosting an interactive working group session to understand how maintainers manage burnout and talk about how to facilitate conversations about burnout and mental health in their open source communities. We will also discuss the Project Burnout metric from our DEI working group.
